title: Strengthening Practical Competencies in Curriculum Development: Interpreting and Applying the Meaning of School Garden Education Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: The learning objectives text of a school garden project can be analyzed to extract core semantic elements
Text analysis techniques (morpheme frequency, co-occurrence networks) can interpret the value system of educational projects
Based on analysis results, a report can be written to evaluate the school garden project's contributions within social contexts

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
